analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0xa673802792379714201ebc5f586c3a44b0248681.sol:
	Contract SPTI has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xa673802792379714201ebc5f586c3a44b0248681.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xa673802792379714201ebc5f586c3a44b0248681.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0xa673802792379714201ebc5f586c3a44b0248681.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0xa673802792379714201ebc5f586c3a44b0248681.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
